page.title: 09Clubs - 30th Norwich Scouts
page.content: The 30th Norwich Group of the Scouts Association meets in Sprowston. It is a fairly large group of boys. There is a Beaver Colony for boys under eight, two Cub packs for 8-11 year olds, two Scout Troops (Boys 11-16), one Sea Scout troop and also a Venture Scout Unit for Boys who are sixteen.Usually by the age of 21 those who have remained have been recruited as helpers for the other units. The group is the responsibility of Mr.Paul Weeks who both co-ordinates activities and runs the Cub Packs. During their time in the various packs or troops the boys are engaged in both indoor activities at their Headquarters and numerous camps. Parents help to arrange fetes etc. to raise money for equipment.
